summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1927, for the improvement of Twenty-sixth Avenue North and Twenty-eighth Avenue North, each from East Madison Street to East Helen Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing a sixteen (16) foot plank roadway thereon, under Ordinance No. 19845, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
